Ice::

She growled slightly as she was picked up. Her mind went into a semi 
dream state.  The virus was still changing her in some ways.  Her 
telepathic abilities were getting stronger. She heard what Lunarpine 
was thinking, but not reacting to it.  In her dream state, she could 
see through Lunarpine's mind and sees.  She saw him carrying her and 
knew he was taking her back to the base.  She heard his curious mind 
wondering what had happened to her.  She thought about it herself and 
couldn't quite find the answers.  She just knew that the matrix 
wanted it this way and she would just have to live with it.

Her shoulder was dripping blood down onto Lunarpine. Even in her 
sleep, she could smell the blood. She didn't like th smell of it at 
all.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine thought he'd heard something, no someone calling to 
> him. "What was that?" He wondered, smelling the air again. He 
> followed the scent to her. He could still hear her words in his 
head 
> when she called to him. "What's become of you?" He thought, 
curiosity 
> flooding his mind.
> 
> He heard a voice over his comm. Veratis wanted an update on the 
> situation. "I found her" he replied, getting her back was going to 
be 
> the diffivult part.
> 
> Three clean up drones aproached scanning her. A needle came out of 
> the first one and headed for Ice. 
> 
> "No" Lunarpine yelled as he grabbed hold of it, It was trying to 
> neutralise the virus. He knew that if that happened she'd be dead. 
> Veratis reprogrammed 2 of the drones to help get her back. 
Lunarpine 
> picked Ice up on his back and with the help of the drones began 
> carrying her back.
> 
>
